description: Stores the user's budget allocation and spending in different categories (jars).

columns.user_id: UUID – The user's unique identifier, used to join with the saving_goals table.
columns.jar_code: VARCHAR(10) – The code for the budget jar. Valid values: NEC (Necessities), FFA (Financial Freedom), EDU (Education), LTSS (Long Term Savings), PLY (Play), GIV (Give/Charity).
columns.virtual_budget_amount: NUMERIC(15,2) – The total budget allocated to the jar.
columns.spent_amount: NUMERIC(15,2) – The amount spent from the jar.
columns.remaining_budget: NUMERIC(15,2) – The remaining budget in the jar (virtual_budget_amount - spent_amount).
columns.last_income_allocation: TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE – The last time money was added to the jar.
columns.last_spending_date: TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE – The last time money was spent from the jar.
columns.created_at: TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE – The date the record was created.
columns.updated_at: TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE – The date the record was last updated.
